statements: SELECT * FROM corporate_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT action_name, action_type FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_type='dividend';
SELECT action_name, action_date FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_description LIKE '%bonus%';
SELECT action_name, action_type, dividend_payment FROM corporate_actions WHERE dividend_payment > 500;
SELECT * FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM corporate_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC, action_type ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT action_name, action_description FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT action_type, action_date, dividend_payment FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_type = 'Dividend' ORDER BY dividend_payment DESC;
SELECT action_name, action_date, action_type FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_description LIKE '%announcement%' ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01' AND action_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM corporate_actions;
SELECT action_id, action_name FROM corporate_actions ORDER BY action_name DESC;
SELECT action_id, action_name, action_type FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_type='Bonus';
SELECT * FROM dividend_payments WHERE recipient='John Doe' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT recipient, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM dividend_payments GROUP BY recipient HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT action_name, action_type FROM corporate_actions;
SELECT * FROM dividend_payments WHERE recipient='Company A';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM dividend_payments;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM dividend_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT action_name AS action, action_type AS type FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_id=1;
SELECT action_name, action_type FROM corporate_actions;
SELECT * FROM dividend_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT company_name FROM companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_amount, recipient_id FROM dividend_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT action_name, action_type, action_date FROM corporate_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC, action_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name FROM companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM dividend_payments WHERE recipient_id = 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM corporate_actions WHERE action_type = 'merger' AND action_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_name, action_name FROM companies JOIN corporate_actions ON companies.company_id = corporate_actions.company_id ORDER BY company_name ASC, action_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CorporateActions;
SELECT action_id, action_description FROM CorporateActions WHERE action_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Companies ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM DividendPayments WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT shareholder_name, shares_owned FROM Shareholders WHERE shares_owned > 1000 ORDER BY shares_owned DESC;
SELECT * FROM CorporateActions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT shareholder_name, shares_owned FROM Shareholders WHERE shares_owned > 100 ORDER BY shares_owned DESC;
SELECT action_description, action_date FROM CorporateActions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT company_name, payment_amount FROM Companies INNER JOIN DividendPayments ON Companies.company_id = DividendPayments.company_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM CorporateActions;
SELECT id, action_type FROM CorporateActions WHERE action_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT description FROM CorporateActions WHERE action_type = 'Dividend';
SELECT id, address FROM Recipients;
SELECT * FROM PaymentReports WHERE total_payments > 10000;
SELECT * FROM CorporateActions;
SELECT id, action_date, action_type FROM CorporateActions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM CorporateActions WHERE action_type = 'Dividend';
SELECT * FROM DividendPayments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT p.report_id, p.report_date, p.total_payments, r.name FROM PaymentReports p JOIN Recipients r ON p.generated_by = r.id;
